overview: The second release from the Slackjaw team, Stick It is an energetic romp around the UK bouldering scene. Accompanied by a quirky, exciting soundtrack, this film takes us on a breakneck tour of the UK’s top bouldering venues.  Your guides: the country’s best climbers – Ben Moon, Malcolm Smith, Jerry Moffatt, Airlie Anderson, John Gaskins and British Champion Andy Earl.  The problems: all the country’s stickiest.  Infectious, fun stuff.
tagline: WARNING: This film contains more busting of guts than your average sausage factory.
title: Stick It
